perch.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: if a bird perches on something, it flies down and sits on it
perch.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a branch or stick where a bird sits
perch.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: a high place or position, especially one where you can sit and watch something
